TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Build Rhinoceros buildings and units faster in this city.
TEXT.French: Construit les bâtiments et unités Rhinos plus vite dans cette Ville.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]This free building is used to enable the building of the special Rhinoceros units in all your cities.

Rhinoceros units have the Stampede ability and at the moment they're the only unit with it and the only unit that can develop it. If made a little stronger to make them a bit more viable (and to let them represent better the kind of amazing destructive capacity these animals have in RL) they'll be given an amazingly powerful niche use throughout the early era, particularly as a powerful counter against the strategy of splitting up units to delay attack forces from taking a position.[PARAGRAPH:2]Rhinos also cause some collateral so if one can survive the first fight and the units in the stack they're attacking can still within range of being given further collateral damage, a rhino can uniquely inflict collateral to a stack more than once when it attacks.[PARAGRAPH:2]There is no evidence Rhinoceros were ever trained for warfare. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Giraffe Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] building is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.

There is no evidence rhinoceros were ever trained for mounted warfare. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rhinoceros Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] building is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.
TEXT.Italian: Non ci sono prove che i rinoceronti siano mai stati addestrati per la guerra. L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Allevatore di rinoceronti[COLOR_REVERT] fa parte delle [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Tecnologie che potrebbero essere esistite.

TEXT.English: There is no evidence this unit was ever used. It is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.
TEXT.Italian: Non c'è alcuna prova che quest'unità sia mai stata usata in battaglia. Fa parte delle [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Tecnologie che potrebbero essere esistite.

TEXT.English: There is some evidence that [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Asiatic War Rhinoceros[COLOR_REVERT] were used. It is just not [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]good[COLOR_REVERT] evidence. They were used as shock "troops", charging into the enemy army doing some damage but mostly causing panic. Thus making the enemy easier to defeat.
TEXT.Italian: Ci sono alcune prove che il [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rinoceronte asiatico da guerra[COLOR_REVERT] venne utilizzato in battaglia. Semplicemente, queste prove non sono [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]certe[COLOR_REVERT]. Erano usate come truppe d'assalto, caricando contro i nemici, causando alcuni danni ma soprattutto panico, rendendo così i nemici più facili da sconfiggere.
